mean_cn: n. 封锁，阻碍物；  v. 封锁
mean_en: the action of surrounding or closing a place, especially a port, in order to stop people or goods from coming in or out; a barrier that stops people or vehicles from entering or leaving a place
sentence: We have to take a different road because there is a blockade on this one.
sentence_trans: 我们得换条路走，因为这条路被封锁了。
word_etyma: block挡住 + ade东西，状态 → blockade封锁
